Frequently Asked Questions

platform for creatives around the world

Simple !! Just click Regester button to create account. After registering it Redirect to Login button. Login your account with correct information, then you find your account.

In your home section you have a add button . it will open a page . Just fill up the form with correct information and pressed add/register button. Your data will added.

If you want to update your profile data click settongs button and update your profile data. And if you want to update your items data click edit button.
